data.title: Movies starring Douglas Booth
data.meta_description: On Reelviews you can find extended reviews and ratings for movies starring 'Douglas Booth', including thoughts on the world of cinematography by James Berardinelli.
data.text:

Romeo & Juliet (2013)

A staple of high school literature classes, Romeo & Juliet has proven no less popular with filmmakers, who return to this classic on a regular basis. The problem with making a new version of Shakespeare's most read romance is that, like Hamlet, the...
